researchistaAboutTextPart1: Born from the success story of transforming a PhD thesis on fiscal education into the world's #1 educational board game, Researchista celebrates researchers who bridge the gap between academia and society.
researchistaAboutTextPart2: We believe research should serve humanity. Our platform recognizes and certifies researchers who have successfullyvalorized their academic work into products, services, or initiatives that create measurable social impact.
